book: Book a sports pitch near you
termsIntro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our website.
termsAccess: By accessing or using the Stady website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website.
termsApply: These terms and conditions apply to all users of our website, including owners and members.
termsOwnership1: Stady and its associated logos and trademarks are the property of Stady Corporation. Unauthorized use of our intellectual property is strictly prohibited.
termsOwnership2: Users are not permitted to copy, distribute, or use any of our intellectual property without prior written consent.
termsOwnership3: Any violation of our intellectual property rights may result in legal action.
termsUserConduct1: Users of the Stady website are expected to conduct themselves in a responsible and respectful manner.
termsUserConduct2: Prohibited actions include but are not limited to:
termsUserConduct5: - Violating the privacy of other users
termsUserConduct6: - Attempting to gain unauthorized access to the website's systems. Users found in violation of these terms may be banned from using our website.
termsLiability1: Stady is not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of using our website or booking sports grounds through our platform.
termsLiability2: Users are solely responsible for their interactions with other users and the accuracy of the information provided on our website.
termsLiability3: Stady does not guarantee the availability or quality of sports grounds listed on our platform. Users are advised to perform their own due diligence before making a booking.
termsLiability4: Stady is not liable for any disputes or conflicts arising between owners and members.
termsGoverningLaw1: These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Tunisia.
termsGoverningLaw2: Any legal action or proceedings arising out of or in connection with these terms shall be brought exclusively in the courts of Tunisia.
termsGoverningLaw3: By using our website, you agree to submit to the jurisdiction of the courts of Tunisia.
termsContact: Please contact us if you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms and conditions.

about.title: About Stady
about.description1: Stady is a sports grounds reservation app that aims to simplify the process of finding and booking sports facilities. Our mission is to connect sports enthusiasts with the perfect sports grounds for their needs, whether it's for casual games, league matches, or training sessions.
about.description2: With Stady, you can easily browse through a wide range of sports grounds, including football fields, basketball courts, tennis courts, and more. Our user-friendly interface allows you to search for grounds based on location, sports type, availability, and amenities.
about.description3: Whether you're an individual looking for a place to play your favorite sport or a team manager organizing regular matches, Stady provides you with all the tools you need to make informed decisions and secure your desired booking slots.
about.description4: We are committed to providing a seamless and enjoyable experience for all users, ensuring that you can focus on what you love - playing sports. Join Stady today and discover the perfect sports grounds for your next game!
about.quote: "Play hard, have fun, and let Stady take care of the rest!"

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description1: For any inquiries or support, feel free to reach out to us.
contact.quote: "We're here to assist you and answer your questions!"

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.ownerDescription1: Are you an owner of a sports ground or facility? Stady provides you with a platform to showcase your ground and connect with sports enthusiasts looking for a place to play. Here's how it works for owners:
howItWorks.ownerDescription2: 1. Register your sports ground on Stady and provide detailed information about your facility, including location, amenities, pricing, and availability.
howItWorks.ownerDescription3: 2. Showcase your ground's features with photos and descriptions to attract potential customers.
howItWorks.memberDescription1: Are you a sports enthusiast looking to book a sports ground or facility? Stady makes it easy for you to find and reserve the perfect place to play. Here's how it works for members:
howItWorks.memberDescription2: 1. Browse through a wide range of sports grounds and facilities available on Stady.
howItWorks.memberDescription3: 2. Use filters to narrow down your search based on location, sports type, availability, and amenities.
howItWorks.memberDescription4: 3. View detailed information about each ground, including photos, pricing, amenities, and user reviews.
howItWorks.memberDescription5: 4. Check the availability calendar to find open slots and book your preferred time.
howItWorks.benefit1: - Owners can reach a larger user base, showcase their facilities, and manage bookings efficiently.
howItWorks.benefit2: - Members can easily discover and book sports grounds that meet their specific requirements.
howItWorks.benefit3: - Secure online payments ensure a hassle-free booking process.
howItWorks.benefit4: - Transparent communication and messaging system facilitate easy coordination between owners and members.
howItWorks.joinStady: Join Stady today and experience the convenience and excitement of sports ground reservation!
